quotes.quote: Life is a message scribbled in the dark.
What message is needed when heart speaks to heart?
Our eternal message of hope is that dawn will come.
The message sent is not always the message received.
Live the message, don't just read about it and preach.
Messages that fail to fascinate will become irrelevant.
The message behind the words is the voice of the heart.
The freedom message brings us together, it doesn't divide us.
The message coming back at all of us is: live without closure.
Trust that your message is a unique one that people need to hear.
The simpler the message, the broader the meaning, in many respects.
When you want your message to be heard, always speak from your heart.
A blog is a message in a bottle, both in purpose and likely readership.
If you want to burrow a message into a human mind. Work it into a story.
A difficult message to hear is an opportunity to enrich someone's life.
Everything you do sends a message about who you are and what you value.
Every message, regardless of form or content, is an expression of a need.
Every happening, great and small, is a parable whereby God speaks to us, and the art of life is to get the message.
Don't let the culture influence your message, let your message influence the culture.
The Buddhist message is a message not of the negation of life, but one of affirmation.
A message prepared in the mind reaches a mind; a message prepared in a life reaches a life.
Nature's message was always there and for us to see. It was written on the wings of butterflies.
Every message of despair is the statement of a situation from which everybody must freely try to find a way out.
A record is a message, timeless.
The message of great art is to disturb.
Every happening is a lesson, a message.
Send message to the future by writing it today!
Through silence only the good messages go unheard.
Stay consistent with your message and who you are.
It's not about the language, it's about the message.
